summary:
The Campeonato Brasileiro is Brazil's top football league, featuring 20 teams. It's also known as the Brasileirão. The league was founded in 1959, and its format has evolved over time. The competition is very strong, ranking among the best in South America and the world.

Palmeiras is the most successful club, winning 12 titles. The league is popular globally, broadcast in 155 countries, and it's one of the richest, valued at over $1.43 billion. The champions can boast of being the best in Brazil and among the best worldwide.
title: Campeonato Brasileiro Série A
